rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a reception area. Suitable for displaying local art and family photos.
Spacious living area connected to the garden view, following Mediterranean aesthetic principles with large windows and open spaces.
Comfortable dining space adjoining the kitchen. Includes an open plan design to integrate modern Indian residential needs.
Well-equipped kitchen with sufficient storage and designed for efficient workflow. Incorporates local building norms and energy efficiency considerations.
Small space for appliances and storage, ensuring functionality without cluttering the living areas.
Private bathroom attached to one of the bedrooms, designed with local building codes and Vastu principles in mind.

openings.description: Main entrance door facing east for positive energy flow according to Vastu guidelines.
Large windows offering abundant natural light and garden views, positioned in the south-east direction as per Vastu recommendations.
Door connecting kitchen to dining area ensuring a cohesive space flow.
Ventilation window designed for natural light and airflow, adhering to building norms.
